http.title: Aeroluffspars - Carbon fibre roller reefing/furling systems
http.html:
Home                                  Dinghies                                  Cruisers               

The Aero Luffspar is the lightest, smallest diameter, and most compact flexible foresail furling & reefing system available.



Aero Luffspar for Dinghies

(with a 3mm luff wire)
Aero Luffspar for Cruisers

(with a 4mm & 5mm luff wire)
  • Spar diameter only 8mm
  • Spar weight less than 0.5kg
  • Spar can be fitted to any
    existing furling system.
  • Spar also supplied with the
    furling/reefing system
    incorporated within unit.
  • Spar sufficiently flexible to be
    bent into a wide U shape.
  • Spar supplied in lengths for
    luff sleeves up to 6m.
    For Dinghy enquiries contact:

    Ralph Roberts

    dinghies@aeroluffspars.com

    +44(0)1508 538 522
  • Spar diameter only 10mm
  • Spar weight less than 1kg
  • Spar supplied with the furling/
    reefing system incorporated
    within unit.
  • Spar sufficiently flexible for a
    bowsprit to be raised without
    the need to detach spar.
  • Spar supplied in lengths for
    luff sleeves up to 8m.

    For Cruiser enquiries contact:

    Peter Thomas

    cruisers@aeroluffspars.com

    +44 (0) 7768 363 620

The Aero Spar featured at the 2016 & 2017 RYA Dinghy Shows

Featured on stand A18 at the 2016 ShowThe Aero Spar stand at the showWayfarer 'Spree Lady' displaying trip from London to HelsinkiWayfarer 'Hafren' featuring its record breaking cruise around Britain.

The Aero Spar featured on the Shrimper 19 and 21 at the 2016/2017 shows


The Aero Spar featured on the Shrimper 21 at the 2017 London boat show





















W10405 Cuillin Perl, beached at TraighTuath on the north end of Coll, on the West coast of Scotland – the Aero Spar enabling the genoa to be completely furled or reefed down to any size, for both convenience and safety.
Protected by Patents GB2477167 and GB2499394
